config.introduction: Ovdje možete konfigurirati vaše komponente i Home Assistant. Nije moguće baš sve konfigurirati koristeći UI zasada, ali radimo na tome.

editor.confirm_unsaved: Imate nespremljene izmjene. Jeste li sigurni da želite napustiti?

area_registry.caption: Registar područja
area_registry.description: Pregled svih područja u vašem domu.

picker.introduction: Područja se koriste za organiziranje gdje su uređaji. Ove informacije će se koristiti u cijelom Home Assistant da vam pomogne u organizaciji sučelja, dopuštenja i integracija s drugim sustavima.
picker.introduction2: Da biste postavili uređaje u neko područje, pomoću donje veze idite na stranicu s integracijama, a zatim kliknite na konfiguriranu integraciju da biste došli do kartica uređaja.

core.introduction: Promjena konfiguracije može biti naporan proces. Znamo. Ovaj će vam odjeljak pokušati olakšati život.

core_config.edit_requires_storage: Uređivač je onemogućen jer je konfiguracija spremljena u configuration.yaml.

reloading.heading: Ponovno učitavanje konfiguracije
reloading.introduction: Neki dijelovi programa Home Assistant mogu se ponovno učitati bez potrebe za ponovnim pokretanjem. Pritiskom na ponovno učitavanje učitava se nova konfiguracija.

server_management.heading: Upravljanje poslužiteljem
server_management.introduction: Kontrolirajte vaš Home Assistant server ... iz Home Assistant.

validation.heading: Provjera konfiguracije
validation.introduction: Provjerite svoju konfiguraciju ako ste nedavno napravili neke promjene u konfiguraciji i želite biti sigurni da je sve ispravno

server_control.caption: Upravljanje poslužiteljem
server_control.description: Ponovo pokrenite i zaustavite Home Assistant poslužitelj

validation.heading: Provjera konfiguracije
validation.introduction: Provjerite svoju konfiguraciju ako ste nedavno napravili neke promjene u konfiguraciji i želite biti sigurni da je sve ispravno

reloading.heading: Ponovno učitavanje konfiguracije
reloading.introduction: Neki dijelovi programa Home Assistant mogu se ponovno učitati bez potrebe za ponovnim pokretanjem. Pritiskom na ponovno učitavanje učitava se nova konfiguracija.

server_management.heading: Upravljanje poslužiteljem
server_management.introduction: Kontrolirajte vaš Home Assistant server ... iz Home Assistant.
server_management.confirm_restart: Jeste li sigurni da želite ponovo pokrenuti Home Assistant?
server_management.confirm_stop: Jeste li sigurni da želite zaustaviti Home Assostant?

customize.caption: Prilagodba

picker.introduction: Podešavanje atributa po entitetu. Dodane/uređene prilagodbe će odmah stupiti na snagu. Uklonjene prilagodbe stupit će na snagu kada se entitet ažurira.

warning.include_sentence: It seems that your configuration.yaml doesn't properly
warning.not_applied: Changes made here are written in it, but will not be applied after a configuration reload unless the include is in place.

customize.attributes_customize: The following attributes are already set in customize.yaml
customize.attributes_outside: The following attributes are customized from outside of customize.yaml
customize.different_include: Possibly via a domain, a glob or a different include.
customize.attributes_set: The following attributes of the entity are set programmatically.
customize.attributes_not_set: The following attributes weren't set. Set them if you like.

picker.introduction: Automatizacijski urednik omogućuje stvaranje i uređivanje automatizacije. Molimo pročitajte [upute] (https://home-assistant.io/docs/automation/editor/) kako biste bili sigurni da ste ispravno konfigurirali Home Assistant.
picker.no_automations: Nismo mogli pronaći nikakve automatizirane uređaje
picker.only_editable: Samo automatizacije definirane u automations.yaml se mogu uređivati.
picker.delete_confirm: Jeste li sigurni da želite izbrisati tu automatizaciju?

editor.introduction: Upotrijebite automatizaciju kako bi vaš dom oživio
editor.load_error_not_editable: Samo automatizacije u automations.yaml se mogu uređivati.
editor.unsaved_confirm: Imate nespremljene izmjene. Jeste li sigurni da želite napustiti?

triggers.name: Okidač
triggers.introduction:
Okidači su ono što pokreće obradu pravila o automatizaciji. Moguće je odrediti više okidača za isto pravilo. Kada pokrenete okidač, Home Assistant provjerit će uvjete, ako ih ima i pozvati akciju. 

 [Saznajte više o pokretačima.] (Https://home-assistant.io/docs/automation/trigger/)
triggers.delete_confirm: Jeste li sigurni dai želite izbrisati?

conditions.name: Uvjet
conditions.introduction:
Uvjeti su neobvezni dio pravila o automatizaciji i mogu se upotrebljavati kako bi se spriječilo da se neka akcija dogodi prilikom pokretanja. Uvjeti izgledaju vrlo slični pokretačima, ali su vrlo različiti. Okidač će pogledati događaje koji se događaju u sustavu, a stanje samo gleda kako sustav izgleda upravo sada. Okidač može primijetiti da je prekidač uključen. Stanje može vidjeti samo ako je uključen ili isključen prekidač. 

 [Saznajte više o uvjetima.] (Https://home-assistant.io/docs/scripts/conditions/)

actions.name: Radnja
actions.introduction:
Radnje su ono što će Home Assistant učiniti kada se aktivira automatizacija. 

 [Saznajte više o radnjama.] (Https://home-assistant.io/docs/automation/action/)

picker.introduction: Urednik skripta omogućuje vam stvaranje i uređivanje skripta. Molimo slijedite donju vezu da biste pročitali upute kako biste bili sigurni da ste ispravno konfigurirali Home Assistant.
picker.no_scripts: Nismo mogli pronaći nikakve skripte koje se mogu uređivati

editor.introduction: Upotrijebite skripte za izvršenje slijeda radnji.
editor.load_error_not_editable: Samo skripte u scripts.yaml se mogu uređivati.
editor.delete_confirm: Jeste li sigurni da želite izbrisati tu skriptu?

picker.introduction: Urednik scena omogućuje vam stvaranje i uređivanje scena. Molimo slijedite donju vezu da biste pročitali upute kako biste bili sigurni da ste ispravno konfigurirali Home Assistant.
picker.no_scenes: Nismo mogli pronaći nikakve scene koje se mogu uređivati
picker.only_editable: Samo scene definirane u scenes.yaml se mogu uređivati.
picker.delete_confirm: Jeste li sigurni da želite izbrisati tu scenu?

editor.introduction: Upotrijebite scene kako bi vaš dom oživio
editor.load_error_not_editable: Samo scene u scenes.yaml se mogu uređivati.
editor.unsaved_confirm: Imate nespremljene izmjene. Jeste li sigurni da želite napustiti?
editor.name: Ime

devices.introduction: Dodajte uređaje koje želite uključiti u svoju scenu. Postavite sve uređaje na stanje koje želite za ovu scenu.

entities.introduction: Entiteti koji ne pripadaju uređajima mogu se postaviti ovdje.
entities.device_entities: Ako dodate entitet koji pripada uređaju, uređaj će biti dodan.

cloud.caption: Home Assistant Cloud
cloud.description_features: Upravljajte kad ste izvan kuće, integrirajte se s Alexa i Google Assistantom.

login.title: Prijava putem clouda
login.introduction: Home Assistant Cloud vam pruža sigurnu udaljenu vezu s vašom instancom dok ste izvan kuće. Također vam omogućuje povezivanje s uslugama samo u cloudu: Amazon Alexa i Google Assistant.
login.introduction2a: , tvrtka koju su osnovali osnivači Home Assistanta i Hass.ioa.
login.introduction3: Home Assistant Cloud je usluga na pretplatu s besplatnim probnim razdobljem od mjesec dana. Nisu potrebne informacije o plaćanju.
login.learn_more_link: Saznajte više o Home Assistant Cloudu.
login.start_trial: Započnite besplatno probno razdoblje od 1 mjeseca
login.alert_email_confirm_necessary: Prije prijave morate potvrditi svoj e-mail.

forgot_password.title: Zaboravljena lozinka
forgot_password.subtitle: Zaboravili ste lozinku
forgot_password.instructions: Unesite svoju e-mail adresu i poslat ćemo vam link za resetiranje lozinke.
forgot_password.check_your_email: Check your email for instructions on how to reset your password.

register.title: Register Account
register.headline: Start your free trial
register.information: Create an account to start your free one month trial with Home Assistant Cloud. No payment information necessary.
register.information2: The trial will give you access to all the benefits of Home Assistant Cloud, including:
register.feature_remote_control: Control of Home Assistant away from home
register.feature_webhook_apps: Easy integration with webhook-based apps like OwnTracks
register.information3: This service is run by our partner
register.information3a: , a company founded by the founders of Home Assistant and Hass.io.
register.information4: By registering an account you agree to the following terms and conditions.
register.account_created: Account created! Check your email for instructions on how to activate your account.

account.thank_you_note: Thank you for being part of Home Assistant Cloud. It's because of people like you that we are able to make a great home automation experience for everyone. Thank you!
account.integrations_introduction: Integrations for Home Assistant Cloud allow you to connect with services in the cloud without having to expose your Home Assistant instance publicly on the internet.

remote.title: Remote Control
remote.access_is_being_prepared: Remote access is being prepared. We will notify you when it's ready.
remote.info: Home Assistant Cloud provides a secure remote connection to your instance while away from home.
remote.instance_will_be_available: Your instance will be available at

alexa.title: Alexa
alexa.info: With the Alexa integration for Home Assistant Cloud you'll be able to control all your Home Assistant devices via any Alexa-enabled device.
alexa.enable_ha_skill: Enable the Home Assistant skill for Alexa
alexa.info_state_reporting: If you enable state reporting, Home Assistant will send all state changes of exposed entities to Amazon. This allows you to always see the latest states in the Alexa app and use the state changes to create routines.

google.title: Google Assistant
google.info: With the Google Assistant integration for Home Assistant Cloud you'll be able to control all your Home Assistant devices via any Google Assistant-enabled device.
google.enable_ha_skill: Activate the Home Assistant skill for Google Assistant
google.info_state_reporting: If you enable state reporting, Home Assistant will send all state changes of exposed entities to Google. This allows you to always see the latest states in the Google app.
google.enter_pin_info: Please enter a pin to interact with security devices. Security devices are doors, garage doors and locks. You will be asked to say/enter this pin when interacting with such devices via Google Assistant.
google.enter_pin_hint: Enter a PIN to use security devices

webhooks.title: Webhooks
webhooks.info: Anything that is configured to be triggered by a webhook can be given a publicly accessible URL to allow you to send data back to Home Assistant from anywhere, without exposing your instance to the internet.
webhooks.no_hooks_yet: Looks like you have no webhooks yet. Get started by configuring a
webhooks.link_learn_more: Learn more about creating webhook-powered automations.

alexa.title: Alexa
alexa.banner: Editing which entities are exposed via this UI is disabled because you have configured entity filters in configuration.yaml.

google.title: Google Assistant
google.banner: Editing which entities are exposed via this UI is disabled because you have configured entity filters in configuration.yaml.

dialog_cloudhook.available_at: The webhook is available at the following url:
dialog_cloudhook.managed_by_integration: This webhook is managed by an integration and cannot be disabled.
dialog_cloudhook.info_disable_webhook: If you no longer want to use this webhook, you can
dialog_cloudhook.confirm_disable: Are you sure you want to disable this webhook?

devices.caption: Uređaji
devices.details: Ovdje su sve pojedinosti vašeg uređaja.
devices.confirm_rename_entity_ids: Želite li također preimenovati ID entiteta svojih entiteta?

picker.introduction: Home Assistant drži registar svakog entiteta koji je ikada vidio da se može jedinstveno identificirati. Svaki od tih entiteta imat će dodijeljeni ID entiteta koji će biti rezerviran za samo ovaj entitet.
picker.introduction2: Koristite registar entiteta da biste nadjačali naziv, promijenili ID entiteta ili uklonili stavku iz Home Assistant. Napomena, uklanjanjem unosa registra entiteta neće se ukloniti entitet. Da biste to učinili, slijedite donju vezu i uklonite je s stranice integracije.

editor.enabled_description: Onemogućeni entiteti neće biti dodani u Home Assistant.
editor.confirm_delete: Jeste li sigurni da želite izbrisati ovaj unos?
editor.confirm_delete2: Brisanjem unosa entitet se neće ukloniti iz Home Assistanta. Da biste to učinili, morat ćete ukloniti integraciju '{platform}' iz Home Assistanta.
editor.note: Napomena: to možda neće raditi još sa svim integracijama.

person.caption: Osobe
person.description: Upravljajte osobama koje Home Assistant prati.
person.introduction: Here you can define each person of interest in Home Assistant.
person.note_about_persons_configured_in_yaml: Note: persons configured via configuration.yaml cannot be edited via the UI.
person.no_persons_created_yet: Looks like you have not created any persons yet.
person.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this person?
person.confirm_delete2: All devices belonging to this person will become unassigned.

detail.name: Ime
detail.device_tracker_intro: Odaberite uređaje koji pripadaju ovoj osobi.
detail.no_device_tracker_available_intro: When you have devices that indicate the presence of a person, you will be able to assign them to a person here. You can add your first device by adding a presence-detection integration from the integrations page.

integrations.caption: Integracije
integrations.note_about_integrations: Not all integrations can be configured via the UI yet.

config_entry.delete_confirm: Jeste li sigurni da želite izbrisati tu integraciju?
config_entry.restart_confirm: Ponovo pokrenite Home Assistant da biste dovršili uklanjanje ove integracije

external_step.description: Ovaj korak zahtijeva da posjetite vanjsku web stranicu.

editor.caption: Pregled korisnika
editor.system_generated_users_not_removable: Unable to remove system generated users.
editor.confirm_user_deletion: Are you sure you want to delete {name}?

add_device_page.discovery_text: Pronađeni uređaji će se pojaviti ovdje. Slijedite upute za uređaj (e) i postavite uređaj (e) u način uparivanja.

network_management.introduction: Commands that affect the entire network

node_management.introduction: Run ZHA commands that affect a single device. Pick a device to see a list of available commands.
node_management.hint_battery_devices: Note: Sleepy (battery powered) devices need to be awake when executing commands against them. You can generally wake a sleepy device by triggering it.
node_management.hint_wakeup: Some devices such as Xiaomi sensors have a wake up button that you can press at ~5 second intervals that keep devices awake while you interact with them.
node_management.help_node_dropdown: Select a device to view per-device options.

clusters.help_cluster_dropdown: Select a cluster to view attributes and commands.

cluster_attributes.help_attribute_dropdown: Select an attribute to view or set its value.
cluster_attributes.help_get_zigbee_attribute: Get the value for the selected attribute.
cluster_attributes.help_set_zigbee_attribute: Set attribute value for the specified cluster on the specified entity.

cluster_commands.help_command_dropdown: Select a command to interact with.

services.reconfigure: Ponovno konfiguriaj ZHA uređaj (liječenje uređaja). Upotrijebite ovo ako imate problema s uređajem. Ako je uređaj u pitanju uređaj za bateriju, provjerite je li budan i prihvaća naredbe kada koristite ovu uslugu.
services.updateDeviceName: Postavite prilagođeni naziv za ovaj uređaj u registru uređaja.

network_management.introduction: Pokrenite naredbe koje utječu na Z-Wave mrežu. Nećete dobiti povratne informacije o tome je li većina naredbi uspjela, ali možete provjeriti OZW dnevnik da biste to pokušali otkriti.

ozw_log.introduction: View the log. 0 is the minimum (loads entire log) and 1000 is the maximum. Load will show a static log and tail will auto update with the last specified number of lines of the log.

network_status.network_starting_note: To može potrajati, ovisno o veličini vaše mreže.
network_status.network_started_note_some_queried: Aktivni čvorovi su kontaktirani. Čvorovi koji spavaju će biti kontaktirani kada se probude.
